org.trianacode.taskgraph

Class InstanceIDManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.taskgraph.InstanceIDManager

  • public class InstanceIDManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A static manager class that keeps track of the current instance ids.

      • registerID

              java.lang.String id)
        Registers the instance id for a tool

      • registerID

        public static java.lang.String registerID(Task task,
                          Tool tool,
                          boolean preserveinst)
        Registers an instance ID for the specified task. This is ID is either new or preserved from the original tool as specified by the preserveinst flag
        Parameters:
        task - the task an instance id is being registered for
        tool - the tool used to instantiate the task
        preserveinst - a flag indicating whether the instance id is preserved from the original tool.
        Returns:
        the instance ID for the task

      • unregisterID

        public static void unregisterID(Task task)
        Unregisters the instance id for a task
